product_name: Columbia Axel Hauler Wheeled Duffel - 28" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built for long journeys and activities that require ample gear, the super-roomy 28 in. Columbia Axel Hauler Wheeled Duffel has a water-shedding exterior and frame that's collapsible for storing. Super-tough ballistic polyester fabric has been treated with Omni-Shield(R) advanced repellency to resist rain, stains and abrasion. 1-stage telescoping handle features a double pole for durability and a rubber grip for comfort. Beefy rolling wheels give exceptional clearance. Reinforced framing allows the Axle to stand up vertically so you can access contents like a locker; collapses down for compact storage. External zip pocket; zippered pocket in main compartment; removable toiletry pouch for the security line. Haul handles and compressions straps manage your load. The 28 in. Columbia Axel Hauler Wheeled Duffel has a whopping 100-liter capacity. Closeout.
short_description: Built for long journeys and activities that require ample gear, the super-roomy 28 in. Columbia Axel Hauler Wheeled Duffel has a water-shedding exterior and frame that's collapsible for storing.
